package.name: Affiliate4You_A4yPixelAndFeed
package.summary: Automatic tracking pixel placement and xml product feed generator for affiliate marketing purpose.
package.description:
1. Contents - Uses - Xml product feed generator - Tracking pixel on success page
2. Uses This module is intended as a convience meassure for Affiliate4You customers and is optimized to those specifications. However the xml product feed can be used for other purposes.
3. Xml product feed generator When enabled this will provide a xml product feed that has the required fields for Affiliate4you as well as any custom fields you added personally. You can use this generator to easily create a product feed with the correct specifications.
Admin options: - Enable/Disable - Optional URL parameters - Width for small image - Height for small image - Width for medium image - Height for medium image - Usual shipping time for products - Usual shipping cost for products
4. Tracking pixel on success page When enabled this will add a tracking pixel to the succes sale page without you having to edit any base files. The correct campaign ID will be supplied by Affiliate4you.
Admin options: - Enable/Disable - Campaign ID
